description: The Holy Fire ceremony goes ahead in Jerusalem as most worshippers worldwide are told to stay at home.
title: Coronavirus: Orthodox Easter weekend marked under lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Orthodox Easter weekend marked under lockdown - BBC News
maintext: It will however be distributed to the homes of believers who request it. President Klaus Iohannis appealed to Romanians to give up on the idea of having their loved ones close to them, in order to prevent the spread of the virus.
